name: Cock-roach-revolution
description:
In a Bomb Factory far away there is a Cockroach Revolution happening... you find yourself in control of Carl. Carl is a cockroach that wants to free his friends from the stomping boots of the factory workers. Save your friends to unlock new areas, but watch out as this is not without danger.

Made By : Edvin, Izzy, Joep, Kuura, Oskar and Yael

Controls:

Movement: WASD 

Sonar ability: Left Mouse Button 

Action key: E
